subject: p12410066
Findings: The patient is status post left pneumonectomy procedure. There is expected leftward shift of the cardiomediastinal contours. Slight increase in amount of fluid in the lower left hemithorax, but majority of the pneumonectomy space remains gas-filled. Right lung is overexpanded, and note is made of linear atelectasis at the right base. Subcutaneous emphysema persists in the left chest wall.
